system.description:
orc-boss

Destiny Playbook

You have proven to be the strongest, biggest, and most cunning of all orcs.

Requirements

To become the Orc-Boss, you must earn the Fellowship of the Orcs.

The Orc-Boss starts with Orc Smash!

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.the-orc-boss.Item.GvKZ6Xd3gLjqhDW1]{Orc smash!}

Advancement

When you Level Up, choose one Advancement from either this list or from your Basic Playbook, then mark it. You may only choose each option once.

  • Take the Orc's Core Moves (The Fires of Industry and Dishonor Before Death). If you already have them, instead increase one of your stats by +1, to a maximum of +3.
  • Take an Orc Custom.
  • Take an Orc-Boss Custom.
  • Take an Orc-Boss Custom.
  • Take an Orc-Boss Custom.

Custom Moves

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.the-orc-boss.Item.2UhFCmbb1Uv5yGgs]{Defiant to the last}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.the-orc-boss.Item.hNoutKL9Xw2H0h4T]{Evil's heart}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.the-orc-boss.Item.fWSnykwQSEAPRgr8]{Infinite strength}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.the-orc-boss.Item.viGYZQazw406ZmYU]{Sixth sense}
